original: tadeva karasampuṭaṃ madhyamāṅgulyāveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā kanyasāṅgulisūcīkṛtāṃ ubhau aṅguṣṭhāgrayavākārasthitau

original: paścāt tatraiva paṭe vālukāmayaṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā madhu kṣīraṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt /

yat bravīti tat sarvam kurvanti

original: parvataśikharamāruhya paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya tailāktaṃ candaśakalikāṃ juhuyāt /

original: lakṣaparisamāptau poṣadhikena rūpakāreṇāśvatthakāṣṭhamayaṃ tṛśūlaṃ lakṣaṇopetaṃ kṛtvā

analyzed: sa pāta abhihūtam kṛtvā paurṇamāsyām sugandha gandhaiḥ samupalipya yathā vibhavataḥ paṭasya agratas

analyzed: pūjām kṛtvā dakṣiṇa haste kṛtvā sakalām rātrim sādhayet
yāvat jvalati iti

bhūta adhipatiḥ bhavati

sarva nāga vidyādharāṇām rājā bhavati
poṣadhikena karmakāreṇa tāmra ghaṭakam kārayet

original: prātihārakapakṣe pūrṇamāsyāmudārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā paṭasyāgrataḥ pratiṣṭhāpya tāvajjaped yāvajjvalitaḥ /
analyzed: prātihāraka pakṣe pūrṇamāsyām udārām pūjām kṛtvā paṭasya agratas pratiṣṭhāpya tāvat japet yāvat jvalitaḥ

original: tataḥ tasmiṃ hastaṃ prakṣipya yamicchati tat sarvaṃ prādurbhavati /

original: yasyāṃ mṛṇmayaṃ vālukāmayaṃ vā pūrṇamāsyāṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā,
analyzed: yasyām mṛṇmayam vālukā mayam vā pūrṇamāsyām caityam kṛtvā

original: tatraiva paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā sphaṭīkamaṇimṛṇmayā vā dakṣiṇahastena gṛhītvā paryaṅkopaviṣṭaḥ tāvajjaped yāvajjvalatīti /

cintāmaṇi dhārī vidyādharaḥ bhavati

original: sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya lakṣaṃ japet /
analyzed: sa dhātuke caitye paṭam pratiṣṭhāpya lakṣam japet

original: prātihārakapakṣapūrṇamāsyāṃ vidhivat pūjāṃ kṛtvā pradīpamālāṃ ca udārāṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇahastena dhvajaṃ śuklavastrāvalambitaṃ gṛhya tāvajjaped  #
analyzed: prātihāraka pakṣa pūrṇamāsyām vidhivat pūjām kṛtvā pradīpa mālām ca udārām kṛtvā dakṣiṇa hastena dhvajam śukla vastra avalambitam gṛhya tāvat japet  /
yāvat jvalati
dhvaja vidyādharaḥ bhavati
sarvatra apratihataḥ

original: prātihārakapakṣe pūrṇamāsyāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhagavatyā prajñāpāramitāpustakaṃ
analyzed: prātihāraka pakṣe pūrṇamāsyām paṭasya agratas mahatīm pūjām kṛtvā bhagavatyā prajñāpāramitā pustakam

original: sugandhagandhaiḥ pralipya sugandhapuṣpamālābhiḥ veṣṭayitvā vāmahastena gṛhya paryaṅkopaviṣṭastāvajjaped yāvajjvalati /
analyzed: sugandha gandhaiḥ pralipya sugandha puṣpa mālābhiḥ veṣṭayitvā vāma hastena gṛhya paryaṅka upaviṣṭaḥ tāvat japet yāvat jvalati

yatra icchati tatra gacchati
bodhisattva caryā cārī bhavati

original: kumārīṃ prāsādikāṃ susnātālaṅkṛtāṃ kṛtvā paṭasyāgrataḥ yathāvibhavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā vāmahastena gṛhya sthitastāvajjaped yāvat tayā saha jvalati
analyzed: kumārīm prāsādikām su snāta alaṅkṛtām kṛtvā paṭasya agratas yathā vibhavataḥ pūjām kṛtvā vāma hastena gṛhya sthitaḥ tāvat japet yāvat tayā saha jvalati
tayā eva sārdham vidyādharaḥ bhavati

original: ekaliṅgasyopari hastaṃ datvā tāvajjaped yāvat sakhāyā na paśyanti /
analyzed: eka liṅgasya upari hastam da tvā tāvat japet yāvat sakhāyāḥ na paśyanti

original: trayodaśyāṃ candragrahe sūryagrahe vā haritālaṃ bodhivṛkṣapatrāntaritaṃ kṛtvā maheśvarāyatane sadhātuke caityai tāvajjaped yāvad dhūmāyati
analyzed: trayodaśyām candra grahe sūrya grahe vā haritālam bodhivṛkṣa patra antaritam kṛtvā maheśvara āyatane sa dhātuke caityai tāvat japet yāvat dhūmāyati
tilakam kṛtvā antarhitaḥ bhavati

original: kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ samudrataṭe vṛkṣamūle sahasraṃ japet trisandhyaṃ saptarātram /

yathā iṣṭam gṛhṇīyāt
mudga āhāraḥ parvata śikharam āruhya aṣṭa sahasram japet viṃśati rātram
parvata gatāni maṇi ratnāni darśanam bhavati

original: tato hastaśirasi kṛtaṃ tasyopari upaviṣṭa aṣṭasahasraṃ japet /

analyzed: rājānam rājamātram vā vaśīkartu kāmaḥ tasya madhūcchiṣṭakena pratikṛtim kṛtvā nirdhūma aṅgāreṣu kṣipet sapta rātram sa vaśaḥ bhavati

original: āyasaṃ pradeśamātraṃ khaḍgaṃ kṛtvā sadhātuke caitye paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā aśvatthapatraiḥ pradakṣiṇāvarttaiḥ khaḍgaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya  #
analyzed: āyasam pradeśa mātram khaḍgam kṛtvā sa dhātuke caitye paṭam pratiṣṭhāpya udārām pūjām kṛtvā aśvattha patraiḥ pradakṣiṇa āvarttaiḥ khaḍgam pratiṣṭhāpya

original: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ vā paṭasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā saṅghoddiṣṭakāṃ

original: bhikṣaṃ bhojya manaḥśilāyāṃ bhūmau padmaṃ śatapatraṃ lekhya padmakarṇikāyāṃ upaviśya
analyzed: bhikṣam bhojya manaḥśilāyām bhūmau padmam śata patram lekhya padma karṇikāyām upaviśya

original: āryasaṅghaṃ vaśīkartukāmena arkapuṣpāṇāṃ paṭasyāgrataḥ aṣṭasahasraṃ nivedayet saptarātram /

guggulu gulikānām paṭasya agratas aṣṭa sahasram juhuyāt
suvarṇa sahasram labhate
paṭasya agratas kunduru dhūpam aṣṭa sahasram juhuyāt sapta rātram
nidhānam labhate

original: paṭasyāgrataḥ arkakāṣṭhasamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ trisandhya sahasraṃ juhuyāt /
analyzed: paṭasya agratas arka kāṣṭha samidhānām dadhi madhu ghṛta aktānām trisandhya sahasram juhuyāt

kārṣāpaṇa śatam labhati

original: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ vā mṛtakapuruṣaṃ akṣatāṅgaṃ gṛhya snānālaṅkṛtaṃ kṛtvā sugandhapuṣpadhūpairabhyarcya vāmapādenorasimākramya  #
analyzed: kṛta puraścaraṇaḥ kṛṣṇa aṣṭamyām kṛṣṇa caturdaśyām vā mṛtaka puruṣam akṣata aṅgam gṛhya snāna alaṅkṛtam kṛtvā su gandha puṣpa dhūpaiḥ abhyarcya vāma pādena urasim ākramya
mastake āhantavyaḥ
tatas uttiṣṭhati
puṣpa loha maye khaḍge āhantavyaḥ
jātarūpam suvarṇam labhati
atha na icchati vaktavyam chardasva iti
tatas cintāmaṇi nirgacchati

original: taṃ śirasi kaṇṭhe vā kṛtvā anyatra vā baddhvā yaṃ cintayati taṃ prādurbhavati /
analyzed: tam śirasi kaṇṭhe vā kṛtvā anyatra vā baddhvā yam cintayati tam prādurbhavati

original: śuklapratipadamārabhya ahorātroṣitaḥ samudragāminiṃ nadīṃ aṃsamātramudakamavatīrya jātīpuṣpāṇāṃ daśasahasrāṇi pravāhayet /
analyzed: śukla pratipadam ārabhya ahar rātra uṣitaḥ samudragāminim nadīm aṃsa mātram udakam avatīrya jātī puṣpāṇām daśa sahasrāṇi pravāhayet
daśa māṣakam labhate
suvarṇa sahasram vā

original: śuklapratipadamārabhya samudragāminyā nadyā padmānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi nivedayet saptarātram /
analyzed: śukla pratipadam ārabhya samudra gāminyā nadyā padmānām daśa sahasrāṇi nivedayet sapta rātram

original: kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ tāmeva nadīmavatīrya puṣpāṇāṃ daśasahasrāṇi pravāhayet saptāham /
analyzed: kṛta puraścaraṇaḥ tām eva nadīm avatīrya puṣpāṇām daśa sahasrāṇi pravāhayet sapta aham

original: aśokapuṣpaiḥ caṇakamātrāṃ guṭikāṃ kṛtvā paṭasyāgrataḥ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ trisandhyaṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt saptarātram /

apāmārga samidhānām eṣa vidhiḥ

original: suvarṇasahasraṃ labhate aśokaguṭikāvyatimiśraiḥ apāmārgatandulaiḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ tryaktānāṃ daśasahasrāṇi (Vaidya 526) juhuyāt /
analyzed: suvarṇa sahasram labhate aśoka guṭikā vyatimiśraiḥ apāmārga tandulaiḥ paṭasya agratas tri aktānām daśa sahasrāṇi vaidya juhuyāt
nāma grahaṇena rāja kanyam labhati māsa mātreṇa

original: rājānaṃ samantriṇaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ paṭasyāgrataḥ aśokasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya aśokapuṣpāṇāmeva dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ daśa sahasrāṇi juhuyāt
analyzed: rājānam sa mantriṇam vaśīkartu kāmaḥ paṭasya agratas aśoka samidbhiḥ agnim prajvālya aśoka puṣpāṇām eva dadhi madhu ghṛta aktānām daśa sahasrāṇi juhuyāt
sa mantrī vaśam āgacchati

original: paṭasyāgrataḥ agniṃ prajvālya apāmārgasamidbhiḥ śatapuṣpāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktāṃ daśasahasrāṇi juhuyāt /
analyzed: paṭasya agratas agnim prajvālya apāmārga samidbhiḥ śata puṣpām dadhi madhu ghṛta aktām daśa sahasrāṇi juhuyāt
sva gṛhe nidhānam paśyati
samudra gāminyām nadyām kaṭī mātram udakam avatīrya daśa sahasrāṇi nivedayet
ye tām jighranti
vāma hastena muṣṭim badhvā lakṣam japet

original: kṛtvā anyatamaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhya pūrṇamāsyāṃ sādhanamaṇḍalaṃ likhya vastropari dravyaṃ
analyzed: kṛtvā anyatamam dravyam gṛhya pūrṇamāsyām sādhana maṇḍalam likhya vastra upari dravyam
sthāpya paryaṅka upaviṣṭaḥ tāvat japet yāvat siddhiḥ bhavati

original: phalake yamicchati dravyaṃ tasya tasya nāmaṃ likhya aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā yatra nāgastiṣṭhati tatra hrade kṣeptavyā /
analyzed: phalake yam icchati dravyam tasya tasya nāmam likhya aṣṭa sahasra abhimantritam kṛtvā yatra nāgaḥ tiṣṭhati tatra hrade kṣeptavyā
tasya nāgaḥ sarvam sampādayati
sapta ahena niyatam vastum sampādayati

original: kūpe hrade vābhilaṣitavyaṃ nāmaṃ likhya dravyādīnāṃ phalake tathaiva hrade kṣeptavyam /
analyzed: kūpe hrade vā abhilaṣitavyam nāmam likhya dravya ādīnām phalake tathā eva hrade kṣeptavyam
tatas puruṣa udake nimajjayitavyam
sa tasmin mahāntam śabdam śṛṇoti
amukasmin pradeśe dravya ādikam tiṣṭhati
tatas grahetavyam

original: nadīsantārakādau daśaṣu ca sabhāyāṃ rājakule vā vivāde vā smartavyam /
analyzed: nadī santāraka ādau daśaṣu ca sabhāyām rāja kule vā vivāde vā smartavyam
sarvatra aparājitaḥ bhavati

original: yamicchati vaśaṃ kartum tasya mukhe āryamañjuśriyaṃ dhyātvā kiñcit sambhāṣaṇaṃ kuryāt /
analyzed: yam icchati vaśam kartum tasya mukhe ārya mañjuśriyam dhyātvā kiñcid sambhāṣaṇam kuryāt
acirāt vaśaḥ bhavati
udakam bhājane kṛtvā ārya mañjuśriyam dhyāyīta
tena pānīyena aṣṭa sahasra abhimantritena daṣṭam sañcintayet
nirviṣaḥ bhavati

original: tatroktena vidhānena maṇḍalaṃ praviṣṭa sampūrṇasya vṛṣasya apatitagomayaṃ gṛhya haviṣyāhāraḥ samaunī maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā tāvajjapet paurṇamāsyāṃ  #
analyzed: tatra uktena vidhānena maṇḍalam praviṣṭa sampūrṇasya vṛṣasya a patita gomayam gṛhya haviṣya āhāraḥ sa maunī maṇḍalam kṛtvā tāvat japet paurṇamāsyām
ārabhya yāvat tṛtīyam api lakṣam japet
brahmacārī ṣaṣ māsām vratam etat caret
māsena atra siddhiḥ
ṣaḍbhiḥ māsaiḥ kṛṣṇam jagat pratyakṣam bhavati
śarīreṇa api parām siddhim avāpnoti
samāsena sarva mantram sādhayati
mahā kalpa rājāt ārya mañjuśrī mūla kalpāt
hema sādhana paṭalaḥ visaraḥ parisaraḥ parisamāptaḥ
parisamāptam ca yathālabdham ārya mañjuśriyasya kalpam iti

original: svasti śrīrājamaṅgalakāvasthitena mārgaśīrṣaśuklā + + + padānakṣatre siṃhasthe 'pi gurau mañjuśrīkalpaṃ samāptamiti /
analyzed: svasti śrī rāja maṅgalaka avasthitena mārgaśīrṣa śuklā

original: śrīmūlaghoṣavihārādhipatinā śrībo + + + madhyadeśād vinirgatena paṇḍitaravicandreṇa likhitamiti / + +
analyzed: śrī mūlaghoṣa vihāra adhipatinā śrī bo      madhyadeśāt vinirgatena paṇḍita ravicandreṇa likhitam iti   /
śubham bhūyāt
